12:31:56</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {

     var tx = inputs.tx
  
     try {
        tx.output = inputs.cmdout;
       
        output = JSON.parse(inputs.cmdout)

        tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId
        tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash

        tx.serials = output.receipt.serials

		if (output.receipt.serials.toString() != "") {
        	var nft = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_nft")
        	nft.initialize()
        	nft.name = output.receipt.serials.toString() + "@" + tx.token.token_id.toString()
        	nft.serial = output.receipt.serials.toString()
        	nft.token = tx.token
        	nft.insert()
        } 
       
        if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') {
            tx.status = 'completed'
            tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status
        } else {
            throw Error("Hedera status is not success")
        }
		
    } catch (e) {
        tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString()
		tx.hedera_status = output.error.status
        tx.status = 'failed'
    } finally {
        tx.update() 
    }
  
})(inputs, outputs);
</value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 12:32:03</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {

     var tx = inputs.tx
  
     try {
        tx.output = inputs.cmdout;
       
        output = JSON.parse(inputs.cmdout)

        tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId
        tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash

        tx.serials = output.receipt.serials

		if (output.receipt.serials.toString() != "") {
        	var nft = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_nft")
        	nft.initialize()
        	nft.name = output.receipt.serials.toString() + "@" + tx.token.token_id.toString()
        	nft.serial = output.receipt.serials.toString()
        	nft.token = tx.token
        	nft.insert()
        } 
       
        if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') {
            tx.status = 'completed'
            tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status
        } else {
            throw Error("Hedera status is not success")
        }
		
    } catch (e) {
        tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString()
		tx.hedera_status = output.error.status
        tx.status = 'failed'
    } finally {
        tx.update() 
    }
  
})(inputs, outputs);
